title: A Christmas Catastrophe
description: I thought Christmas was the most joyous time of the year... until I lost my entire family in a hit-and-run...then joy disappearedI made peace with the fact I’d never love again... Until I met Amelia McDonald who changed...everything. I know I’m not perfect nor do I claim to be but when life-changing events keep occurring, it starts to eat away at me. Until I met Jaydin... can he change everything for me?
author: C. Renee
